text: 2.7-8: Ro 16.25-26; Ef 3.5; 3.9; Kor 1.26; 2 T 1.92.7-8: Ru 23.34; Zo 7.48; FG 13.27; 2 Ko 3.14Nza Fhe Bakɨme zorga ki ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ, nza nta bun nzuai. Fhe Bakɨme zumgum kha nuiana muuŋgi. Ana fhum wo ndɨkndɨgar, nza nzuav tuav ga muuŋgi, nza ana han Hevenan mpirmpirɨga vhuun muunga. Mba mpirmpirɨgar vhuun kameŋ zorga ki, kha nuiana guman pana the ne kaŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe ne kaŋgia kake, mbe Heven gari Guma Bakɨme, mbe ana ndi khanarareŋ ga tɨga fhuge ntɨɨŋ.
